text: Hi all, have anyone created a time series graph in HubSpot based on the historical data of a property.

Hello guys! :slightly_smiling_face: :slightly_smiling_face: :slightly_smiling_face:
I want to conditionally display another field in HubSpot form only when another input field is blank (empty). So once this blank input is being filled in with characters, then this field would disappear.
I don't see such option in settings, maybe there is some expression after "is equal to" that would allow me for this?

Hi guys, really simple question but where are these default padding values coming from? this is a section created by dragging in a module and is not a pre-defined section within the template file, Thanks in advance!
From css rules, try inspecting your page and see where those default values are coming from
Aah! right, thank you

Hello, I am new for HubSpot, I have a question, hope someone can help. When I create a HubSpot developer account then I create a APP in this developer account, but some minutes later, I cannot update this APP, like I want to add some description, but the Save button cannot work. Or, I add the company domain in this APP, but save error.
there is a difference. between a developer account and an app developer account
you need the app developer account i think
yes, i mean APP developer account, for me, it is <https://app.HubSpot.com/developer/xxxxxx>
no, i am not talking about the url
there are different user accounts in HubSpot
but this looks like there is either a bug or you dont have the permissions to change that
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/get-started>
I follow up this document to create a develop account, is it wrong?
please check the link that i have send you
and choose the first one
yes, I use this link you sent before, but also have this problem
then it might be a but, what Browser are you using?
maybe try it with a different one
check if you have the right permissions to be allowed to change that
I am using Edge
do you know how to check the permission?
Settings - User and Teams
now, I also cannot create a new App.
i think you should contact support
do you know which channel I can contact? Thanks in advance.
<@U01QVR44MEY> would it be possible to create a graph using this information? basically I would like a CRM card showing the historical trend of a property.

Hello every I'm Thulani, I just we just rolled out a new membership Site in our organization and we have realized we need to make some changes especially on the Default Login / Logout, register, reset password Pages the Front End part I have created the CSS design on my local machine for what I want to change in the front end.
But my Hubl is not that good - and I haven't been able to implement effect changes in the in the Design Manager - I cloned the the membeship-login.html file and the membership.css from the cmsdefaultsystempages. I have followed the guides on createing new templates for these system pages
2 files
But my Challenge has been with linking my CSS file to the custom html hubl file to effect changes

Nothing Seems to be working for me at this point , its a knowledge gap on the file structures and  organization in HubSpot,  but I feel given the right direction I should be able to know how to make the changes I need to make. Because I can well make the changes on the CSS i need to make when I am in the Devtools but I am unable to apply my CSS file to the cloned pages I have for these membership system pages

Hello <#C22PU4LV8|general> - please can someone figure out what is going on with modules on our website <http://syrve.com|syrve.com>? Looks absolutely fine on HubSpot but website is completely off :cold_sweat:please help!

Well that's a little tricky, currently crm cards only support showing reports (HubSpot ones) you can't custom build a graph. You could build out your own site with the graph and then iframe it with the modal popup HubSpot offers

<@U05EG28V686> We’ve had the same issue. Here is an embed code to track scheduled meeting:
(You’ll need to change the meeting url to your own)

```<div class="meetings-iframe-container" data-src="<https://meetings.HubSpot.com/support224?embed=true&call_type=sales>"></div>
<script type="text/javascript" src="<https://static.hsappstatic.net/MeetingsEmbed/ex/MeetingsEmbedCode.js>"></script>
<script>
window.addEventListener('message', function receiveMessage(e) {
  if (true) {
    if (e.data && e.data.meetingBookSucceeded) {
      if (e.data.meetingBookSucceeded == true) {
        try {
            
            //Analytics event goes here
            
        } catch (err) {}
      }
    }
  }
}, false);

</script>```
<@U03FJQPSC0Y> good use case for a graph component

Hello, So i made a module for a calculator with the post endpoint I made it so the results can be mailed. but when I try it the mail is not being sent because of

• " was not sent to contact because this is a non-marketing contact"
What should be the right approach here?
It looks like you are trying to send an  email to a non-marketing contact. So either choose a  marketing contact or convert this one into a marketing contact
can this be done automatically?
This article talks about how to "Set contacts as marketing and non-marketing" <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/contacts/marketing-contacts>
not sure if that can be automated, i mean,  GDPR would also need to be taken care of i think...
Thanks! forgot to turn the switch on that makes them marketing contacts :sweat_smile:

I have a client with an existing HubSpot website and we'll be making a new website (completely new theme, modules, posts, content structure) soon. What is the proper way to work on a new environment where our dev team can create modules and main structure, while the client builds out pages/blog posts?

From what I understand, staging content is meant for a page-by-page basis when updated. Do we work on a completely new HubSpot environment/account, and then change the domain over to the new one when it's ready to launch?

Yes, it's true you'd have to make some number of calls to understand more about threads, messages, contacts, users to re-organize all the raw data into a management view like what HubSpot provides natively.

This use case is new to me, at least in my ~ 9 month tenure at HubSpot interviewing developers about their use cases for extending communication outside HubSpot. Could you please explain more about why you'd like to do this?
